faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about MAR-IA.

question1.question: Is my information secure in MAR-IA?
question1.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and comply with the highest data security standards to protect your information and that of your customers.

question2.question: How difficult is it to integrate my existing channels?
question2.answer: It's very simple. Our onboarding process guides you step by step to connect your email accounts, WhatsApp Business and other channels in minutes, without requiring technical knowledge.

question3.question: Will the AI assistant really help me sell more?
question3.answer: Yes. MAR-IA's assistant analyzes your interactions and data to give you real-time suggestions on which leads to prioritize, when to follow up, and what sales arguments to use, increasing your effectiveness.

question4.question: What type of support do you offer?
question4.answer: We offer email support on all our plans. Professional and Enterprise plans include priority chat support and a dedicated account manager to ensure your success.

question5.question: Can I change plans at any time?
question5.answer: Of course. You can upgrade or change your plan at any time from your account panel to adapt to your business's changing needs.
